Cool, what still needs to be packed, disassembled, etc?

I think we're just going to do like a live move, so not too much packing / unpacking.  One thing we learned from the last move is that unpacking needs to be done immediately.  So the first thing we're going to do is get the tool and supply wall over and up. (well after the laser cutter)  We need a 75" long box for the tube and I am thinking of just walking it over.
For those who care & were not aware (if any)..any1 can see your posts..so if you don't want your phone number, etc publicly visible, don't post it to Convore..you don't need to login to see stuff.
